casebody.data:
No. 10-6759. Thomas Joseph Fergusson, Petitioner v. Rick Coursey, Superintendent, Eastern Oregon Correctional Institution. 562 U.S. 1034, 131 S. Ct. 579, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8685.

178 L. Ed. 2d 423,

November 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
